name: Jail Break
description:
This fun little game was created for Mini Jam 60, hosted by ZahranW.

The suggested theme was crime and the idea of a Prison Break game came to mind immediately. Then, the limitation of needing a pause feature was announced and I knew exactly what I wanted the game to be.

Special Thanks To:
- Adarsh S. - Prison artwork - Source: https://adarshs.itch.io/prison-game-asset-pack
- Fliflifly - Animated Hearts - https://fliflifly.itch.io/hearts-and-health-bar
- Hyohnoo - Keyboard interaction artwork - https://hyohnoo.itch.io/keyboard-controller-keys
- Nectanebo - Gui artwork for "Start" and "Game Over" screens - https://nectanebo.itch.io/menu-buttons

Let me know what you think because I am not very experienced in game development and this is the first project that I completely planned and implemented myself.

Also, a web build should be on the way soon! :)
